In the current age of technology, internet security has become an essential part of our lives. The continuous need for online protection has resulted in the development of various antivirus software. One such software is Smadav Antivirus 2016. With over 220 million users, Smadav has gained a reputation as a reliable antivirus software. In this article, we will review this software, and examine its features, benefits, and drawbacks.

## Features

Smadav Antivirus 2016 is equipped with a range of features that help provide comprehensive protection to your system. Some of the most significant features of Smadav are:

### USB Protection

One of the significant advantages of Smadav is its USB protection feature. This feature helps safeguard your system from any viruses that may attack your system through USB ports. It detects and eliminates any virus's spread through USB ports, which is a feature lacking in many of the other antiviruses.

### Additional Protection

Smadav provides additional protection to your computer. The software always runs in the background and monitors the ongoing activities, preventing the installation of malicious programs or files. The additional protection feature of Smadav significantly reduces the risk of any infection.

### Light on System Resources

 Smadav is a lightweight program and does not consume too much of your computer's resources. The antivirus software only requires smaller system resources to run smoothly. It does not affect the performance of your computer even during a thorough scan.

## Benefits

Some of the most prominent benefits of using Smadav Antivirus 2016 include:

### Compatibility

Smadav is compatible with almost all the Windows operating systems available in the market. Whether you're using an older version of Windows or upgraded to the latest Windows 10, Smadav will work seamlessly on any Windows version.

### User-friendly

Smadav Antivirus 2016 has a user-friendly interface that does not require any significant technical knowledge to operate. The simple interface makes it easy for anyone to use the software without any complications.

### Affordable

Compared to other antivirus software, Smadav is relatively cheap. The software's affordability makes it an ideal choice for budget-conscious users who want comprehensive protection.

## Drawbacks

Although Smadav Antivirus 2016 is an excellent option for antivirus software, it has a few drawbacks worth noting:

### Limited Features

Smadav only offers limited features compared to other comprehensive antivirus software. The software is not a complete protection suite, and you may need to purchase additional software for an all-around solution.

### Incomplete Virus Database

Smadav may sometimes detect a virus as clean, especially if it uses the heuristic method. This may be because of the limited database of viruses compared to other top antivirus software. The database of viruses may not be up to date, which could be a severe problem in the case of newer viruses.

## Conclusion

In conclusion, Smadav Antivirus 2016 is an excellent antivirus software that provides additional system protection. Its USB protection feature, compatibility, and light system resource usage make it an ideal option for most computer users. However, the software's limited features and incomplete virus database may require purchasing additional software. Overall, Smadav is an excellent option for budget-conscious users, who want comprehensive protection without compromising on their system performance.
